title: 懂命令的，帮忙看下UUID如何转换
author: 崛灭
txt_content:
这有一个命令方块的命令/give @p skull 1 3 {display:{Name:"Weighted Cube"},SkullOwner:{Id:"dbb0c105-4693-4a6d-8a7c-ac8feab5f844",Properties:{textures:[{Value:"eyJ0ZXh0dXJlcyI6eyJTS0lOIjp7InVybCI6Imh0dHA6Ly90ZXh0dXJlcy5taW5lY3JhZnQubmV0L3RleHR1cmUvNTJiYWViNGEzNWRhOGE4NWQxNGJkY2NmNzE4NGY1NTQ1MDg4Zjk1NGRhNTUxNDRmMjM1YzI5ODNmZGI4ZTA1YiJ9fX0="}]}}}

是给予玩家一个头颅物品，现在我想获取这个正版玩家的ID如何获取？是将这个UUID dbb0c105-4693-4a6d-8a7c-ac8feab5f844 进行操作吗

replies.author: 崛灭
xieshengdada
replies.txt_content: 启动游戏后 关闭游戏之后有文件
